citations.narrative:
At the time of the inspection on January 30, 2025 the facility had not submitted to USDA’s Animal Care Deputy
Administrator a 2024 Fiscal Year annual report detailing its live animal use in research, tests, experiments, or teaching.
Each reporting facility shall submit an annual report to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1 of each
calendar year. Properly identifying species and number of animals held and/or used for research, tests, experiments, or
teaching is necessary to inform the Institutional Official and USDA Animal Care of the scope of animal use at the facility.
Correct by February 6, 2025 by submitting the facility's 2024 Fiscal Year Annual Report to Animal Care’s Deputy
Administrator.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.36(a) 
   
Annual report. 
At the time of the inspection on January 30, 2025 the facility had not submitted to USDA’s Animal Care Deputy 
Administrator a 2024 Fiscal Year annual report detailing its live animal use in research, tests, experiments, or teaching. 
Each reporting facility shall submit an annual report to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1 of each 
calendar year. Properly identifying species and number of animals held and/or used for research, tests, experiments, or 
teaching is necessary to inform the Institutional Official and USDA Animal Care of the scope of animal use at the facility. 
 
Correct by February 6, 2025 by submitting the facility's 2024 Fiscal Year Annual Report to Animal Care’s Deputy 
Administrator. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
